locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Clean, convenient, and spacious. All the things you should expect from a truck stop this place provide. Only complaint i have is the light shut off on my while I was in the shower.

Night staff not very helpful and shower was not thoroughly cleaned. Best surprise was the almost full bottle of piss left by the previous trucker and the inattentive staff in the shower‚Äôs garbage bin

Pd for shower then was told showers were down due to no 1 to clean them! Multiple drivers waiting for shift change to shower.. asked for refund and clerk did not have the knowledge to reimburse $ back on credit card 0/10 stars.  Do netter ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ have problems with WiFi or phone service. No biggie. My app wouldn't provide me a shower and I no longer have a loves card. They wouldn't let me scan my barcode on my app or use my phone #. I have identification but to no avail. They ‚Ä¶
Could give zero star , I'm a truck driver and I just put for 500$ of fuel , and they don't won't a give me the shower , because I don't have the loyalty card on my phone

‚Ä¶ them, I was stopping there to get something to eat at Hardee's.  THen, since my well has collapsed, I have started to take showers there when I am in the vicinity, and, believe me, a stand up shower with hot running water is a luxury in my ‚Ä¶
Really great place to stop & rest you have your shower restrooms, food & drink's & your gas all in one place Amen
If you take a shower there, be sure to tip the attendant....just leave a dollar or two on the sink is what I do.
Buy some fuel,  park in A SPOT,  go wash your  self in a shower (not the public  sink, please).
Nasty shower no coffee made.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ üöø The shower was very clean with lots of hot water and good water pressure. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , which is good.   It's really bad on üöø cleaning wait times.   No one in front of me at 5:45 am and three showers sitting empty.   At 615, I went and spoke to the cashier who was busy on his phone (brandon).   Told them 4 people now ‚Ä¶
Usual pilot. Truck parking area smells like piss, water smells like sewer, shower fan doesnt work even though outlet light is green, and showers are disgusting

Shower needs to be updated with the $16 price tag. The staff was very pleasant and the shower was clean.  Nobody wants to get sprayed by a leaky shower head while adjusting the water, C‚Äômon Corporate get a grip!!
Worst pilot I‚Äôve ever been to 15 people waiting for. Shower while employees talked  was the 7th person in line and waited 3 hours extremely lazy I‚Äôll never be back here again avoid at all cost.

Typical southern truck stop - half the pumps are broken, trash everywhere, shower que longer than available showers on hand, employees more interested in their cell phones than working, lot reeks of urine, fuel island clogged with ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . Most of the pumps were broken. Very small parking lot mostly reserved parking. Went to take a shower, 24 people waiting in line the entire night. So woke up early and still people waiting. The store floors are disgusting. The ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ few parking so many trucks. So i came here. Very good decision. The place is fine. Just know you got to get a key for the shower. M9bile app doesnt apply. Which was fine. It was clean and water was hot. People were friendly. Easy super ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ He stopped in to take a shower after a long day on the road. It had been TWO hours, and he STILL wasn't able to shower. Staff is taking this long to replace towels, and tidy up the bathroom a little bit?? ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Only one is out of order. While I was sitting there washing my clothes the shower attendant was constantly complaining. The attendant stated, he was going to keep the showers out of service for an hour, another time he said thirty minutes. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this place the work there are very friendly they don't mind helping the homeless out with a shower environment is very clean bathrooms excellent clean showers are perfect even the owner of the PFC. ‚Ä¶

A truck stop! With a fresh salad bar!  These people are doing it right.   Wish other truck stops will take note

Update-  had to change my review.     Went in.  Paid 15 dollar for a shower. For a shower that was not clean.
Clean shower. No warm food on Sunday. Decent amount of parking if you can get in a space that's not reserved. Diesel prices are the same as every other truck stop in the area.

‚Ä¶ because I wanted those ribs! Put in debit card and asked for Frequent customer card. Went in for said card and told "we don't have those yet". So I said, how can I get my shower rewards? She said " we have no shower program, that's $12". ‚Ä¶
Wi-Fi Is FREE AND WORKS. Nice Small Shower's Along With A Excellent Kitchen
Fuel 4 truck you came use mudflap app 4 discount price ,this gas station have shower
They look clean until you look closely at the dividing lines of each tile on the wall and see the black mold they have, the showers have no place to put the soap and towel. I don't recommend it.
I really like this place to put diesel, eat, shower everything is very good.
